title: waifu2x-caffe 2+process / ffmpeg error
body:
## Component Versions

Please at least fill in the release version and GUI or CLI version.

- **Video2X release version**: GUI 2.8.1
- **Upscaler version**: waifu2x-caffe 
- **GUI version**:2.8.1
- **CLI version**:

## Symptom

if waifu2x-caffe is activated with 2+ processes, it will extract frames but fail to execute further actions (seems upscaling itself is inturrupted)

if waifu2x-caffe is run with cudnn, scale - whatever, crop size- 160, mode:upconv_7_photo, ffmpeg tune - film, use cache folder : HDD, it fails to execute ffmpeg properly. seems changing cache folder to external hard drive matters - using SSD as cache worked tho. Note: its long length video and took 11 hours until it break.

## Error Log or Screenshots

Please upload or paste the error log here. You may also include screenshots.
**It is highly recommended to include your error log.**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35677394/104717528-cbab0780-576c-11eb-9b5d-ad8c87bf1c0f.png)

2021-01-15 13:33:29.697289 [+] INFO: Killing upscaled image cleaner
[+] INFO: Upscaling completed
[+] INFO: Average processing speed: 8.131453738711997 seconds per frame
[+] INFO: Lanczos downscaling frames
Downscaling: 100%|###########################################################| 299370/299370 [1:15:08<00:00, 66.41it/s]
[+] INFO: Converting extracted frames into video
2021-01-15 14:49:33.875637 [+] INFO: Executing: C:\Users\Scarlet\Downloads\video2x-4.8.1-win32-full\video2x-4.8.1-win32-full\dependencies\ffmpeg\bin\ffmpeg -r 30.0 -hwaccel auto -y -f image2 -i E:\tmpmgq0c5j2\extracted_%d.png -vcodec libx264 -pix_fmt yuv420p -crf 17 -tune film E:\tmpmgq0c5j2\intermediate.mkv
2021-01-15 14:49:36.737357 [+] INFO: Main process waiting for subprocesses to exit

and it stopped until now, and I can execute that command properly to yeet up my cpu. 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35677394/104718072-a66ac900-576d-11eb-9136-1a81339527b4.png)
